College.name: University of Michigan
College.degree: College of Literature, Sciences and the Arts

courses.name: EECS 490- Programming Languages
projects: Wrote scheme lexer & parser in scheme
Implemented semantic analyzer for a fictional C-family language (in Python)
Created python program to generate C++ code from fictional C-family language

courses.name: EECS 493- User Interface Development
projects: Developed VR adaptation of a simple online game. Written in Swift, using Apple's SceneKit rendering, users put phone in Google Cardboard and turn head left and right to collect VR sugar cubes and milk cartons in their coffee cup. As the game progresses, the items fall at a faster rate. Failure to catch an item results in a life loss, users have 3 lives before the game is over.

courses.name: EECS 481- Software Engineering
projects: Created a windows WPF desk top application to update a Microsoft HoLo Lens heads up display in real time. This project was designed for University of Michigan Pediatric E.R. Physicians to use to keep them updated on patient status and queue.

courses.name: EECS 485- Web Systems
projects: Developed an instagram-like python-flask application to share pictures between users
Implemented a python hadoop map-reduce page rank algorithm for searching thousands of documents
